TheSimpletonMod:BurningKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Горящие существа получют урон в конце их хода и теряют Горение.

TheSimpletonMod:ChilisKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yКультура. Наносит урон и накладывает #yГорение ВСЕМ врагам при сборе.

TheSimpletonMod:DepletionKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Depletions are playable status cards that reduce your Energy and Draw next turn.

TheSimpletonMod:GnawberryKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Кусьника - атака которая, наносит moderate урон и восполняет ОЗ.

TheSimpletonMod:HarvestKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Собирает разные #yКультуры чтобы активировать их эффекты.

TheSimpletonMod:HuskKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Husks #b0-cost skill cards that exhaust to grant a small amount of Block.

TheSimpletonMod:MaturityKeyword.DESCRIPTION: A #yCrop is mature if you have stacks equal to its maturity level. One stack of each mature crop is #gHarvested at the start of your turn.

TheSimpletonMod:MushroomKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yКультура. Даёт случайные бесцветные карты при сборе.

TheSimpletonMod:OnionKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yКультура. Накладывает Слабость на случайного врага при сборе.

TheSimpletonMod:Numbed.DESCRIPTION: Temporarily increases the cost of a random card in hand when a card is played.

TheSimpletonMod:PotatoKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yКультура. Yields 0-cost Spud attack cards when harvested.

TheSimpletonMod:PlotKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #ySlot for planting Crops. Your Plots determine how many different Crops you can have at one time.

TheSimpletonMod:SpudKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Spuds are 0-cost attack cards that exhaust to deal modest damage.

TheSimpletonMod:StrawberryKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yКультура. Yields Gnawberry attack cards when harvested that also heal a small amount of HP.

TheSimpletonMod:TurnipKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yКультура. Yields an attack card when harvested which deals scaling damage to all enemies and adds a Turnips card to your discard pile.
